content:
Hello,
I'm new to ZULIP and SAML, but I've been trying to setup the SAML login on my ZULIP server without success.
I managed to display thr SAML login button on the login page, but when I clic on it, it juste load et go back to the login page without displaying any error...
I put my SP URL in SOCIAL_AUTH_SAML_ENABLED_IDPS>"myentityid">url

Could someone please help me ?

Thx

@Robin saint georges Can you show your full SAML configuration in setings.py? (Feel to censor any sensitive details like that exact IdP login url)? And also the logs generated during such a login attempt in /var/log/zulip/server.log and /var/log/zulip/auth.log
